channel.title: [PI] - Activating my curses tab. Rep++
channel.description: I've just added all the curses onto my client, I've added them where they needed to be, but how do I get them to activate (show up) on my prayer tab? It still shows piety and everything, how do I get the curses to appear now?

item.title: [PI] - Activating my curses tab. Rep++
item.dc:creator: @riku9182 riku9182
item.description:
@riku9182 wrote:

[quote=“Liquid Magic, post:4, topic:376099”][quote author=Lord Typhis link=topic=472034.msg3452007#msg3452007 date=1293814916]
dunno, where is that?
[/quote]he has no idea what he is talking about[/quote]
This.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] - Activating my curses tab. Rep++
item.dc:creator: @Lord_Typhis Lord Typhis
item.description:
@Lord_Typhis wrote:

[quote=“Cres, post:5, topic:376099”]you make an interface ID for the curse tab , then you make it so that an action loads the new curses interface instead of the normal prayer interface ( prayer tab ID = 6 )

then again , you still have to configure prayer drain + effects , etc…
GoodLuck mate =D[/quote]

Already configured; thanks mate. Repped.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] - Activating my curses tab. Rep++
item.dc:creator: @Cres Cres
item.description:
@Cres wrote:

you make an interface ID for the curse tab , then you make it so that an action loads the new curses interface instead of the normal prayer interface ( prayer tab ID = 6 )

then again , you still have to configure prayer drain + effects , etc…
GoodLuck mate =D

Read full topic
